mapper.update: UPDATE oil_card_management SET card_balance = (CASE oil_car_num WHEN "cardNum" THEN "balance" END) WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND oil_card_status = 1 AND card_type = 1 AND oil_car_num IN (AND oil_car_num IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR('${cardNum}','[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR('${cardNum}', '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.oil_car_num AS oilCarNum, u.service_name AS companyName, u.service_user_id AS serviceUserId, o.oil_Card_Status AS oilCardStatus, o.pledge_Order_Id AS pledgeOrderId, rel.product_id AS productId, u.service_type serviceType, o.oil_card_type oilCardType, rel.state AS servState, u.service_user_id AS userId, o.card_type AS cardType, o.card_balance AS cardBalance, ov.plateNumber AS bindVehicle FROM oil_card_management o LEFT JOIN service_info u ON u.service_user_id = o.User_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.card_id, GROUP_CONCAT(VEHICLE_NUMBER SEPARATOR ',') AS plateNumber FROM oil_card_vehicle_rel a GROUP BY a.card_id) AS ov ON o.id = ov.CARD_ID LEFT JOIN apply_card_rel rel ON rel.oil_card_num = o.OIL_CAR_NUM AND rel.oil_card_type = o.oil_card_type AND rel.is_recoveryed = 0 where o.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT oc.oil_car_num oilCarNum, oc.id cardId, s.service_user_id serviceUserId FROM oil_card_management oc, service_info s WHERE s.service_user_id = oc.user_id AND s.service_type = 100 AND oc.oil_card_status = 1 AND oc.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
